page.title: 07SUPERSTITIONS/CUSTOMS-CONTD.
page.content: On New years day a dark man walks through the house from the back to the front,he carries a lump of coal.It is supposed to bring good luck. It is bad luck if a black cat crosses in your path. Don't open a umbrella in a house. The Peacocks feather is known as the devils eye. If you see a white horse,spit and it brings you good luck. If the oak is out before the ash we shall have a splash,and if the ash is out before the oak we shall have a soak. If if rains on St.Swithins we shall have rain for fourty days,and if it is sunny we shall have sunny weather for fourty days after. Don't wear red in a field where there is a Bull or he will charge at you.
